shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the SDK requests the maximum size of metadata.
Callback triggered when the SDK requests the maximum metadata size.

section.p: After successfully registering by calling , the SDK triggers this callback every time it sends a video frame. You need to specify the maximum size of the metadata in the return value of this callback.
After successfully registering by calling , the SDK triggers this callback for every video frame sent. You need to specify the maximum size of the metadata in the return value of this callback.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: If the method call succeeds, returns the maximum size in bytes of the metadata buffer you want to use. The maximum value is 1024 bytes.
If the method call succeeds, returns the maximum size (in bytes) of the metadata buffer you want to use. The maximum value is 1024 bytes. Make sure to set the return value.
